title: Significance Of LeBron's Extension, Expectations For Cavs
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN's Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to discuss LeBron’s extension with the Lakers, what potential moves this leaves for Los Angeles, how his opt-out clause keeps the possibility to play with Bronny and what to make of the past 4 seasons for the Lakers. Then, the guys break down what the expectations should be in Cleveland for this season and what teams are ‘All In’ this year.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: What Does LeBron's Extension Mean For The Future Direction Of The Lakers?
